name: Nuclear Arms 8: Navigate the Hate
description:
Killbane is back! After 2 years of taking some time off of being a hero Craig Killbane get's a call from the President. The public think's he's done some questionable things and now he's gotta go answer their questions. How can Craig possibly remember all of the things he's done so many years ago. You're going to have to help Craig dig deep into his mind to find the answers that the public deserves.

Make sure you find the best answers, as your choices will determine which of 3 endings you'll get

- WASD to move

- Click to shoot

- E to pickup ideas and interact with the podium

This game follows the adventures of Craig Killbane. You can check out the previous game in the series in our last Ludum Dare submission here:

Nuclear Arms 7

Our first Nuclear Arms game in 2 years! And our first fully voice acted and with multiple endings. We were a bit rusty starting out and the theme threw us for a bit of a loop. But eventually the ideas started flowing and we managed to bring you the next installment of the infamous Nuclear Arms series :D. This one is definitely an homage to our earlier games which you may or may not have played. If what you've seen in this game peaks your curiosity then please check out our earlier entries!
